name: Zombie Run - Escape from Zombie War 2048
name_original: Zombie Run - Escape from Zombie War 2048
description:
Zombies have taken over the world! Now you must escape the ruins of the Zombie apocalypse and get as far away from the zombies as possible! Avoid the zombies, collect coins, lives, and power ups as you search for a way off this planet!

The walking dead have destroyed the world in an attempt to take over the world. The lone survivor, you are now on an epic quest to search for any sign of human life or a city that has not been zombified. Collect and use the scattered coins to unlock new characters! Collect power ups and lives and avoid the zombies at all cost!

Play as the Dude, the Man, the Lady, and the Baby in this addicting game with the classic pixel art. The sound effects and epic music will blow your mind!

Features people LOVE:
* Easy to pick up and play - Just tap to jump!
* Incredibly fun and addicting!
* Unlock all 4 different characters!
* Play in two different worlds!
* Collect coins, power ups, and lives to achieve epic high scores!
* Classic pixel art combined with epic music!
* Game Center Leaderboards to compete against your friends!

What are you waiting for? It's free! So download it now and try it yourself! But you've been warned!
